catalog_info.title: Law in the World of the Bible
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1129.
catalog_info.description: An examination of what law was and how it operated in ancient Israel through its primary expression in the Hebrew Bible. Attention to the wider contexts of law in the ancient Near East, especially Mesopotamia, in which biblical law originated, and to the legacy of biblical law in the subsequent traditions of early Judaism.
